.. currentmodule:: linuxnet.qos.extension

Utility functions
-----------------

A number of utility functions provide conversions for the units used
by the **tc(8)** command.

.. autofunction:: bwstr2int

--------------

.. autofunction:: datastr2int

--------------

.. autofunction:: unitstr2int

--------------

.. autofunction:: timestr2float

--------------

.. autofunction:: rate2str
